vertigopoi.label: Fort Point
vertigopoi.descString: Scottie rescues Madeline after her jump into San Francisco Bay. Widely regarded as one of the most iconic images in all of cinema...
vertigopoi.address: The Presidio at Golden Gate Bridge

vertigopoi.label: Mission Dolores
vertigopoi.descString: Hitch filmed the graveyard scene with fog filters to heighten the ethereal effect.

vertigopoi.label: Ernie's Restaurant
vertigopoi.descString: The Ambrosia Room serves as a elegant venue for Madeline's dramatic first appearance and close-up.

vertigopoi.label: Palace of the Legion of Honor
vertigopoi.descString: The neo-classic venue for Madeline's haunting by the Portait of Carlotta.

vertigopoi.label: Scottie's Place
vertigopoi.descString: Scottie enjoys his unexpected house guest and fellow wanderer while he can...

vertigopoi.label: The Brocklebank
vertigopoi.descString: Scottie's starting point for him to tail Madeline around The City as she leaves her famous SF apartment building.
